attributes.action: Introduce lifetime benefit capping per person
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I urge the government to introduce legislation capping the amount of benefit one person can receive in their lifetime. Each citizen should be given a benefit 'bank' whereby everytime they withdraw funds from that bank they reduce the amount of benefit available to them in their lifetime. Disabled benefits should be excluded from this capping system
